text: 20.31 Luk 1.4, Jon 3.15-16, 5.24, Lom 1.17, 1 Pi 1.8-9, 1 Jo 5.13 Pen takaw tɨkɨpin awl, Jisas nop nokom gos lɨnɨgɨnɨmɨb agɨl tɨkɨpin. Ne Bɨ God nop aglup ak, binɨb okok kɨlop dɨl kod yenɨgab ak mɨdɨl, God Ñɨne yɨbɨl mɨdeb. Pen nop nokom gos lɨnɨŋɨd nɨm, pelnep yenɨgabɨm. Nɨbi tap gup anɨb okok gos nɨgɨm agɨl, mɨj awl tɨkɨpin.
